blogPost.excerpt: Getting attention for your startup is not easy, but our platform makes it simple. EllisX connects startups with high-quality podcasts, writers and speaking engagements based on mutual interest. Connect with them in 2 clicks. Yes, it’s that easy.
blogPost.body: Getting attention for your startup is not easy, but our platform makes it simple. EllisX connects startups with high-quality podcasts, writers and speaking engagements based on mutual interest. Connect with them in 2 clicks. Yes, it’s that easy.
blogPost.title: EllisX 2.0 - The easiest way to spread the word about your startup
blogPost.author: KP

localize.description: 让你的创业公司获得关注并不容易，但我们的平台让它变得简单。EllisX根据双方的兴趣，将初创公司与高质量的播客、作家和演讲活动联系起来。只需点击2次即可与他们联系。是的，就这么简单。
localize.tagline: 传播创业公司信息的最简单方式

localize.description: 讓你的創業公司獲得關注並不容易，但我們的平臺讓它變得簡單。EllisX根據雙方的興趣，將初創公司與高質量的播客、作家和演講活動聯繫起來。只需點擊2次即可與他們聯繫。是的，就這麼簡單。
localize.tagline: 傳播創業公司信息的最簡單方式

previous.excerpt: Based on the AI technology, we train the system to remove scratches and restore the old family photographs in one click. It is difficult to repair damaged photos without advanced PhotoShop skills. But now, you can do it like a pro with 3 steps!
previous.title: Image Colorizer Repair - Repair old, damaged photographs and remove Scratches online

localize.description: 基于人工智能技术，训练系统一键去除划痕，还原家庭老照片。如果没有高超的PhotoShop技术，是很难修复受损照片的。但现在，你只需3步，就能像专业人员一样完成!
localize.tagline: 修复旧的，损坏的照片和去除划痕在线。

localize.description: 基於人工智能技術，訓練系統一鍵去除劃痕，還原家庭老照片。如果沒有高超的PhotoShop技術，是很難修復受損照片的。但現在，你只需3步，就能像專業人員一樣完成!
localize.tagline: 修復舊的，損壞的照片和去除劃痕在線。
